verses.verse: Behold my servant <WH5650>, whom I uphold <WH8551>; my elect <WH972>, in whom my soul <WH5315> delights <WH7521>; I have put <WH5414> my spirit <WH7307> upon him <WH3318>: he shall bring forth judgment <WH4941> to the Nations <WH1471>.
He shall not cry <WH6817>, nor lift up <WH5375>, nor cause his voice <WH6963> to be heard <WH8085> in the street <WH2351>.
A bruised <WH7533> reed <WH7070> shall he not break <WH7665>, and the smoking <WH3544> flax <WH6594> shall he not quench <WH3518>: he shall bring forth <WH3318> judgment <WH4941> unto truth <WH571>.
He shall not fail <WH3543> nor be discouraged <WH7533>, until he have set <WH7760> judgment <WH4941> in the earth <WH776>: and the islands <WH339> shall wait <WH3176> for his law <WH8451>.

Thus says <WH559> God <WH410> the Lord <WH3068>, he that created <WH1254> the heavens <WH8064>, and stretched them out <WH5186>; he that spread forth <WH7554> the earth <WH776>, and that which comes out <WH6631> of it <WH5414>; he that gives breath <WH5397> unto the people <WH5971> upon it <WH7307>, and spirit to them that walk in it <WH1980>:

I the Lord <WH3068> have called <WH7121> you in righteousness <WH6664>, and will hold <WH2388> your hand <WH3027>, and will keep <WH5341> you <WH5414>, and give you for a covenant <WH1285> of the people <WH5971>, for a light <WH216> of the Nations <WH1471>;

To open <WH6491> the blind <WH5787> eyes <WH5869>, to bring out <WH3318> the prisoners <WH616> from the prison <WH4525>, and them that sit <WH3427> in darkness <WH2822> out of the prison <WH3608> house <WH1004>.
I am the Lord <WH3068>: that is my name <WH8034>: and my glory <WH3519> will I not give <WH5414> to another <WH312>, neither my praise <WH8416> to engraved images <WH6456>.
Behold <WH7223>, the former things are come to pass <WH935>, and new things <WH2319> do I declare <WH5046>: before they spring forth <WH6779> I tell you of them <WH8085>.

Sing <WH7891> unto the Lord <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892>, and his praise <WH8416> from the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>, you that go down <WH3381> to the sea <WH3220>, and all that is in it <WH4393>; the islands <WH339>, and the inhabitants there <WH3427>.

Let the wilderness <WH4057> and the cities <WH5892> there lift up <WH5375> their voice <WH2691>, the villages that Kedar <WH6938> does inhabit <WH3427>: let the inhabitants <WH3427> of the rock <WH5553> sing <WH7442>, let them shout <WH6681> from the top <WH7218> of the mountains <WH2022>.
Let them give <WH7760> glory <WH3519> unto the Lord <WH3068>, and declare <WH5046> his praise <WH8416> in the islands <WH339>.

The Lord <WH3068> shall go forth <WH3318> as a mighty man <WH1368>, he shall stir up <WH5782> jealousy <WH7068> like a man <WH376> of war <WH4421>: he shall cry <WH7321>, Yes <WH6873>, roar; he shall prevail <WH1396> against his enemies <WH341>.

I have long time <WH5769> held my peace <WH2814>; I have been still <WH2790>, and refrained <WH662> myself <WH6463>: now will I cry like a travailing woman <WH3205>; I will destroy <WH5395> and devour <WH7602> at once <WH3162>.

I will make waste <WH2717> mountains <WH2022> and hills <WH1389>, and dry up <WH3001> all their herbs <WH6212>; and I will make <WH7760> the rivers <WH5104> islands <WH339>, and I will dry up <WH3001> the pools <WH98>.

And I will bring <WH3212> the blind <WH5787> by a way <WH1870> that they knew <WH3045> not <WH1869>; I will lead them in paths <WH5410> that they have not known <WH3045>: I will make <WH7760> darkness <WH4285> light <WH216> before <WH6440> them <WH4625>, and crooked things straight <WH4334>. These things <WH1697> will I do <WH6213> unto them <WH5800>, and not forsake them.

They shall be turned <WH5472> back <WH268>, they shall be greatly <WH1322> ashamed <WH954>, that trust <WH982> in engraved images <WH6459>, that say <WH559> to the molten images <WH4541>, You are our gods <WH430>.
Hear <WH8085>, you deaf <WH2795>; and look <WH5027>, you blind <WH5787>, that you may see <WH7200>.

Who is blind <WH5787>, but my servant <WH5650>? or deaf <WH2795>, as my messenger <WH4397> that I sent <WH7971>? who is blind <WH5787> as he that is perfect <WH7999>, and blind <WH5787> as the Lord <WH3068>'s servant <WH5650>?
Seeing <WH7200> many things <WH7227>, but you observe <WH8104> not <WH6491>; opening the ears <WH241>, but he hears not <WH8085>.
The Lord <WH3068> is well pleased <WH2654> for his righteousness <WH6664>' sake <WH1431>; he will magnify the law <WH8451>, and make it honorable <WH142>.

But this is a people <WH5971> robbed <WH962> and spoiled <WH8154>; they are all of them snared <WH6351> in holes <WH2352>, and they are hid <WH2244> in prison <WH3608> houses <WH1004>: they are for a prey <WH957>, and none delivers <WH5337>; for a plunder <WH4933>, and none says <WH559>, Restore <WH7725>.
Who among you will give ear <WH238> to this <WH7181>? who will listen and hear <WH8085> for the time to come <WH268>?

Who gave <WH5414> Jacob <WH3290> for a plunder <WH4933>, and Israel <WH3478> to the robbers <WH962>? did not the Lord <WH3068>, he against whom <WH2098> we have sinned <WH2398>? for they would <WH14> not walk <WH1980> in his ways <WH1870>, neither were they obedient <WH8085> unto his law <WH8451>.

Therefore he has poured <WH8210> upon him the fury <WH2534> of his anger <WH639>, and the strength <WH5807> of battle <WH4421>: and it has set him on fire <WH3857> round about <WH5439>, yet he knew <WH3045> not <WH1197>; and it burned him <WH7760>, yet he laid it not to heart <WH3820>.
